testcase.name: shouldShowStartTimes for current day with realistic clipping scenario
shouldShowStartTimes returns false when there is clipping
shouldShowStartTimes detects clipping when many events on current day
shouldShowStartTimes returns true at the boundary
getStartDate goes back to past Monday if today is Wednesday
shouldShowStartTimes for weekend day with sparse events
shouldShowStartTimes returns true when there is no clipping
getMaxLinesForCurrentDayEvent returns 1 line for past events when clipping
shouldShowStartTimes for current day with few events and space
getMaxLinesForCurrentDayEvent returns at least 1 line for future events
shouldShowStartTimes returns false just over the boundary
getStartDate returns today if today matches start day
shouldShowStartTimes handles single event with plenty of space
getMaxLinesForCurrentDayEvent distributes space equitably for future events when clipping
getMaxLinesForCurrentDayEvent caps current future events when clipping
getMaxLinesForCurrentDayEvent returns 1 line for past events even when no clipping
